author: bundocka
body:
Added new private customisation for re-running only Layer-2 emulator using unpacked MP input towers for Layer-2 hardware/emulator comparisons

Various emulator fixes for jets and sums:

MET ieta range bug fix, cleanup of ieta parameters
Now use caloEta and mpEta conversion functions to deal properly with ieta=29
ieta range fixes for jets and sums

**\* FIXED localTowers initialization in L1TStage2Layer2Producer: required size of caloTowerHashMax+1 due to skipped index in caloTowerHash function.
title: Fix: Added new private Layer-2 emulator specific customisation, various emulator fixes for jets & sums
